imdb.plot outline: 'How to be a Young Billionaire' follows three bright, young British technology entrepreneurs, Robyn Exton, Julia Onken and Josh Buckley, as they join scores of twenty-something app developers drawn to San Francisco by billions of dollars of investment funds and world-class engineering talent.
imdb.title: How to Be a Young Billionaire
akas: How to Be a Young Billionaire (United Kingdom)
plot: 'How to be a Young Billionaire' follows three bright, young British technology entrepreneurs, Robyn Exton, Julia Onken and Josh Buckley, as they join scores of twenty-something app developers drawn to San Francisco by billions of dollars of investment funds and world-class engineering talent.
